text: Ibikorwa byiza ntabwo ari ukwerekeza gusa uburanga bwanyu ahagana iburasirazuba n’iburengerazuba (musali); ahubwo ukora ibyiza ni uwemera Allah, umunsi w’imperuka, abamalayika, ibitabo n’abahanuzi; akanatanga umutungo we mu nzira nziza kandi na we awukunze, afasha abo bafitanye isano, imfubyi, abakene, abari ku rugendo (bashiriwe) n’abasaba gufashwa, akabohoza abacakara, agahozaho iswala (anazitunganya uko bikwiye), agatanga amaturo; abuzuza isezerano ryabo igihe basezeranye, abihanganira ubukene, uburwayi ndetse n’igihe urugamba rwakomeye. Abo ni bo bemeye by’ukuri, kandi ni na bo batinyamana (bya nyabyo)
